# Ansuz

> MCP server for PostgreSQL documentation with pgvector search

## Overview

Ansuz exposes a PostgreSQL documentation table as Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools. It provides 3 tools: search_docs (keyword or hybrid semantic+keyword search), get_doc (full document retrieval), and get_related (bidirectional link graph). Built with only 2 dependencies (mcp + asyncpg).

## Documentation

- [README](README.md): Install, quickstart, config, tools reference
- [CLAUDE.md](CLAUDE.md): Architecture, design decisions, testing
- [Source](src/ansuz/): Python package with config, db, server, schema, cli modules

## Quick Start

```bash
pip install ansuz
export ANSUZ_DATABASE_URL="postgresql://user:pass@localhost:5432/mydb"
ansuz init-db
ansuz serve
```

## Configuration

Set ANSUZ_DATABASE_URL (or DATABASE_URL). Optional: ANSUZ_SCHEMA, ANSUZ_CHUNKS_TABLE, ANSUZ_LINKS_TABLE, ANSUZ_SEARCH_FUNCTION, ANSUZ_COL_* for column names.
